thread.title: Start the new year with a lifetime Windows 11 Pro license for just $40
thread.title_full: Start the new year with a lifetime Windows 11 Pro license for just $40

author: Gabriela Vatu
title: Start the new year with a lifetime Windows 11 Pro license for just $40
text:
Start the new year with a lifetime Windows 11 Pro license for just $40 By Gabriela Vatu Published 4 hours ago Save almost 80% on a new Windows 11 Pro license today.
Readers like you help support Pocket-lint. When you make a purchase using links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Read More.
Windows 11 Pro $40 $199 Save $159 Upgrading your PC to the newest Windows version doesn't have to cost an absolute fortune if you get your key from the right place. Stack Social, for instance, has the software available with 79% off.
$40 at StackSocial Looking to keep your computer running smoothly? Consider upgrading to Windows 11 Pro. With its sleek design, improved speed, and enhanced security features, Windows 11 Pro is the operating system you need. And now, you can get a Windows 11 Pro license from StackSocial for just $40.
Windows is known for its user-friendly interface, and Windows 11 Pro takes it to the next level with its modern design and centered Start menu. The addition of widgets makes it even more convenient to access information with just a click. Plus, the snap layouts feature facilitates multitasking by allowing you to use multiple apps on the same screen.
Related Did your Windows 11 taskbar just disappear? Here's why and how to fix it The Windows 11 taskbar is a vital part of everyone's workflow. But it can go missing sometimes. Here's how to troubleshoot and restore it. But it's not just about aesthetics. Windows 11 Pro introduces new security measures, including a simplified password manager and ransomware protection, so you can feel confident that your data is protected. There are other features, such as enhanced biometrics login for encrypted authorization whenever logging in or installing apps. For your kids, the Smart App Control will help check the apps installed to make sure they're safe to use.
Normally priced at $200, getting a Windows 11 Pro key for only $40 is an absolute steal, so you really shouldn't miss out on this limited-time offer from StackSocial. Simply set up an account, order your license, and receive your key within minutes. Also, if you're interested in other version of the Windows software, know that that Windows 11 Home and Windows 10 Pro are also available for the same $40 right now. These licenses last for a lifetime, so you won't need to pay for them again, which is another benefit of buying from StackSocial at this point.
